profile: Simply Green Home Services was founded on the premise of helping Canadian Homeowners increase their home’s energy efficiency and subsequently reduce energy consumption without sacrificing their quality of life or living standards. My Simply Green offers a wide range of options to help you get you equipped with reliable, top-quality, high efficiency heating and cooling. We don’t want you to ever have to worry about not having a comfortable living environment or readily-available hot water. The satisfaction of everyone who joins the Simply Green family is our top priority, and we will strive to keep the high level of satisfaction for many years after you join. We are constantly growing our Technical and Support teams in order to make sure there will always be someone to provide the personal service you deserve.

profile:
At GTAHeat.ca Inc. we specialize in residential and commercial installations of hydronic snow melt and floor heating systems.
We organize and coordinate between all trades relevant to the installation, can cover everything from gas, plumbing, concrete and Agilasilica overpours, landscaping and HVAC. We are your one stop solution provider and can generate certified and stamped mechanical designs, heat loss calculations and loop layouts, supplemental heating and air conditioning. We also provide fully licensed residential/commercial plumbing and HVAC work. With us as the single point contact there is no need for you to coordinate between trades and solve scheduling conflicts. You give us the directions and we provide you with a turn-key installation.


Absolutely Guaranteed - No Questions asked warranty

Canadian Hydronics Council Certified designs and installation services.

Residential and commercial radiant floor heating, snow melt, space heaters, air handlers, radiators and pool heater installations.
Whole house floor heating or just a basement?
No job is too small or too big for us.
All systems tailored to your needs and budget.
Anywhere you need to heat we can do it with hydronic systems.


Design Services:
BCIN stamped residential heat loss calculations.
Detailed radiant heating boiler room designs and drawings.
BCIN Stamped loop-layout drawings for building permits.
Auditing of existing hydronic heating systems with written report of design and installation deficiencies.
In our FREE Quote you will find a detailed list of parts and components based on our hydronic designs and products for your project.

Please take a look at our FREE quotes form on https://GTAHeat.ca/quote-request
Check out our Portfolio: https://www.gtaheat.ca/portfolio-item

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us! Tel: 647 688 2669 Email: info@gtaheat.ca

Many references available.

Follow us on Instagram! @gtaheat.ca


Thank you for visiting,

GTAHeat.ca Inc.


Working from Niagara to Kingston and Cottage Country. Like Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Niagara Falls, Stoney Creek,
Vaughan, Richmond Hill, New Market, Barrie, Aurora, Caledon, Milton, Brantford, Hamilton, Cambridge, Kitchener, Guelph, Brampton, Toronto, Scarborough, Uxbridge, Aurora, Pickering, Oshawa and surroundings.

profile:
The Top Furnace, Air Conditioning, Heating and Cooling Contractors in Toronto
M & M Heating and Cooling Company, the most experienced and trustworthy HVAC Company in Toronto. With more than 30 years of combined expertise in the industry among our staff members allows us to provide our customers with the best service experience possible, offering smart heating and cooling solutions for both residential and commercial spaces. Our main goal is to ensure that the tradition of customer satisfaction lives on today, and we achieve this through our reliable and highly trained staff. One of the best local HVAC Company Toronto.

M & M Heating & Cooling was founded in 2005. Proudly combining 30 years of experience M & M Heating and Cooling has evolved into one of the most stable and dependable service companies.

Our people is our greatest strength. Here at M & M Heating & Cooling, we pride ourselves on high-quality workmanship, exceptional service, and trustworthiness. All members of our technical teams are properly certified, factory trained and well-experienced. Our customer service representatives possess the necessary technical expertise and equipment knowledge and are always ready to answer your questions over the phone.

M & M Heating & Cooling is proud of our tradition of excellence serving homeowners and business in GTA. Our mission is to provide our customers with the best service experience possible and we achieve this through our reliable and highly trained staff in our Heating and Cooling Company Toronto.


Specializing in radiant floor heating and hydronics. We service, maintain and install all aspects of hvac equipment. Service call to full hvac design for your custom home we do it all!

profile:
Incepted in 2004, My Home Comfort aims at offering home owners enduring comfort and peace of mind through worry-free HVAC installations, repairs and maintenance.

With a wide spectrum of air conditioners, water heaters, furnaces and humidifiers that stand for superior quality, we provide our customers with extensive solutions to meet their specific cooling, heating, air and water treatment needs.

What make our offerings more suitable and desirable are our financing programs that are designed to assist customers economically with their HVAC installation, maintenance and repairs.
services:
Air Conditioning
Replace, repair and maintain your cooling system with the assistance of experienced and trained technicians. Also, you can seek knowledgeable advice of our experts to find an ideal solution for your residential or commercial air conditioning needs.

Furnaces
Create a warm and comfy environment in your home in the cold winter season with the installation of a functional heating system. Ensure year-round comfort with our regular maintenance packages or repair the existing system to operate at peak efficiency.

Water Heaters
Keep your household functional with continuous supply of hot water through our same-day water heater installation and replacement service. With all our professionals certified and trained in HVAC systems and maintenance, you can rest assured that your project is in safe hands.

Humidifiers
Whether you seek regular servicing or professional installation, our in-house team of engineers can maintain and service all makes and models of humidification systems with minimal inconvenience and maximum satisfaction.

Thermostats
While air conditioners, furnaces, humidifiers and water heaters are a common source of home comfort, thermostats have an essential role to play when it comes to operating these systems.

A thermostat activates or deactivates cooling and heating systems to control the temperature within the home. However, the functionality of thermostats varies from model to model and choosing the right can help you save a lot of energy and money on utility bills.

Gas Lines
When it comes to gas line installations and repairs, quality and safety remains inevitable. We specialise in safe gas line repair and replacement and are committed to fast service, fair pricing and 24/7 support.

In addition, all our products and services are backed by limited warranties that guarantee complete satisfaction and peace of mind. We also offer different financing options for our customers to fulfill their HVAC needs without breaking the bank.

If you are seeking a service-driven, highly qualified team of HVAC professionals to install and maintain you’re heating and air-conditioning equipment, then Nu-Air Mechanical Limited will be of interest to you.
Nu-Air Mechanical has been in the service business for 10 + years and one of our best measures of success is our impressive roster of repeat customers. We have worked hard to meet our customers’ expectations and we will always continue to do so. Our technicians are all highly qualified with training experience and have a commitment to provide consistent quality standards and have best value to all our customers. Our service and reliability are second to none.

profile:
AZ Comfort Air is a Mississauga residential and commercial heating & cooling service company.
With 35 years of combined experience in the HVAC industry, our extremely knowledgeable staff can install, service, and maintain your home gas furnace, air conditioner or water heater as well as we service commercial air system backed with a premium five-year parts and labor warranty that is almost exclusive to AZ Comfort Air. Our history stands behind us.

We service and maintain all other major name heating and cooling systems to satisfy the needs of our Mississauga home owners. We work with both residential and commercial HVAC systems. We can service any brand name, guaranteed. Call us for a FREE estimate for a new gas furnace or air conditioner installation.

When required, subcontract work to a licensed professional for Refrigeration.

profile:
AP Heating and Technical Services Inc. is a heating, ventilation, and air conditioning company located in Toronto, Canada. We provide sales, installation and service of heating and cooling products for homes and businesses in Southern Ontario.
AP Heating And Air Conditioning is the authorized dealer of many worldwide respected companies such as ,Keep Rite, Goodman, payne® , aire-flo and others. Fully licensed and well-experienced technicians always perform the highest quality of work and are available in emergency all around the clock all year long.

AP Heating & Technical Services Inc,. always offered lower prices than competitors in order to satisfy even low income customers. If you haven’t found the product you were looking for in our catalog, please call us and will try to ensure that it will be available in the shortest terms.

profile:
The Canadian climate certainly isn’t kind to your HVAC system. During the harsh winter months, frigid temperatures ensure your furnace or boiler is operating at its maximum limits to keep you warm. When summer comes around, the heat has you blasting cool air consistently throughout your home. All of that takes its toll, and eventually, you could be left with an HVAC system that fails at an inopportune time. Ensure that doesn’t happen by giving Precision HVAC Mechanics Inc a call today!

Whether you’re looking to install a new air conditioner or repair an older furnace, we’re equipped to provide HVAC services in Brampton. Bought a new air conditioner after your old one gave out? Let us take the installation off your hands! Are you left shivering in your home due to your boiler malfunctioning? Handling the problem yourself may only make matters worse. Licensed and insured, we’re able to safely and efficiently solve your heating crisis.

Commercial HVAC Service
Looking to add a new rooftop unit to your business? Need a heating or cooling unit for your construction site? We offer commercial HVAC services, too! Keep your clients comfortable in your building with a regularly-maintained HVAC system. We’re also able to provide an energy assessment for your business, giving you an expert recommendation to help you save on your next energy bill.

Don’t wait until your HVAC system fails. We’re open 7 days a week, so give us a call today to let us keep your system running smoothly!

profile:
Cavalry Mechanical is a full-service company specializing in all aspects of plumbing for commercial, residential and multi-family housing.  We ensure that each job, no matter the size, is given the time and attention it deserves.  We offer free quotes for your project and can offer new, innovative ideas.  We try to think outside of the box to ensure you have a multiute of choices for your project.

We are a locally- owned and operated company with over 30 years of experience in the Plumbing industry. Over the years we have progressed in our success with professionalism, integrity, honesty and our dedication to taking pride in our workmanship. With dedication and confidence, we guarantee our workmanship and materials.  We have a close working relationship with our suppliers which ensures that we are up to date on the latest products and technology in the industry.  We are aware of the needs an requirements for any job or project that you may be looking to undertake.

At Cavalry Mechanical Ltd. we are a full service contractor. Providing you with all your residential & commercial needs. Everything from small plumbing repairs to a complete installation. Being full service, this includes all HVAC and electrical repairs or new projects. Before any work is performed we give you a quote so you know what your getting for the price that works for you. All work is included with a one year warranty on parts and labor. So call in the Cavalry to get the job done right the first time!

profile: For the most dependable and affordable home comfort in Toronto, call Rinia Group Mechanical. Our certified team of HVAC technicians services, installs and repairs all makes and models of furnaces, heating systems and air conditioners, including ductless air conditioning and heat pumps. We offer emergency repair service, preventative maintenance plans, and have the experience and expertise to tailor indoor comfort solutions to fit your specific needs. We specialize in heating and cooling service for older Toronto homes. No matter the size, age, or construction of your home, we’ll keep you perfectly cool in summer and perfectly warm in winter.

profile:
We are a fully licensed Toronto heating and air conditioning company providing professional & reliable HVAC services to residential & commercial customers since 1992. 
Our expert HVAC technicians are trained specialists in all heating and air conditioning services, water heaters, humidifiers, boilers & fire places. 
We sell, install & repair all major brands such as: Trane, Goodman, Carrier, Bryant, Rheem, York, Amana & more. Call us today for outstanding heating and air conditioning services

profile: Provincial Smart Home offers smart home automation and home comfort solutions with a focus on how to live smart and how to live comfortably. Our team consists of home heating and cooling, air quality, hot water heater, water treatment, electrical, and smart home technicians to provide a quick and easy installation experience in upgrading or servicing your home. We pride ourselves on helping you bring more value to your home with energy efficient solutions and smart home automation products such as Google Nest (we're a Nest Pro Elite installer), Ring (an Amazon company) and Ecobee. Call Provincial Smart Home Services today at: 1-877-376-7589
